appleSignInError.title: Apple Sign In Error
appleSignInError.unknownMessage:
Unable to sign in with Apple right now.

üì± Possible reasons:
‚Ä¢ You may not be signed in to your iCloud account
‚Ä¢ "Sign in with Apple" may be disabled in your Apple ID settings
‚Ä¢ There may be an internet connection issue

üí° Solution:
Check Settings ‚Üí Apple ID ‚Üí Password & Security ‚Üí Sign in with Apple.
appleSignInError.networkMessage: Please check your internet connection and try again.
appleSignInError.validationMessage:
Apple authentication failed.

Please try again or sign in with email.
appleSignInError.serverMessage:
Unable to connect to Apple servers.

‚Ä¢ Make sure your iCloud account is active
‚Ä¢ Try again in a few minutes
appleSignInError.genericMessage:
An unexpected error occurred.

You can try signing in with email or try again later.
